page.title: 05FARMING (CONT.)
page.content: {PLEASANCE FARM. OWNED BY{MR.LUCAS WHO ALSO OWNS {GROUNDS FARM.}THE FARMHOUSE IS OVER 200YRS. OLD. SOME OF THE BUILDINGS ON THE FARM ARE OVER 100YRS OLD BUT SOME ARE MODERN. MR.LUCAS OWNS 455 ACRES OF LAND. HE EMPLOYS FOUR PEOPLE. MOST DAYS HE WORKS FROM SEVEN IN THE MORNING UNTIL FIVE AT NIGHT BUT SOME DAYS HE BEGINS AT 5A.M.{PLEASANCE FARM}IS A DAIRY FARM. {GROVE FARM. BUILT IN 1705 IT WAS A DAIRY FARM UNTIL 1976 THE HOUSE IS NOW A PRIVATE DWELLING.THE LAND NOW BELONGS TO THE ELECTRICITY BOARD.THE CROPS ARE MAINLY WHEAT AND BARLEY. OTHER CROPS WERE POTATOES AND STRAWBERRIES. THE BARNS AND STABLES ARE UNUSED. THE OWNERS HAVE TWO DOGS.
